solution.text:
Since they are directly proportional.
\( \frac{No. \, of\, Km} {Total \, fare} \) = k
k= \(\frac {a}{_{j}_} = \frac {_{{4*j}}_}{a}\)
\( a^2 = 4 \times _{j}_^2\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Hence, a= _{{2*j}}_
